statements: DELETE FROM noise_levels WHERE location = 'Living Room';
DELETE FROM noise_levels WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND location = 'Living Room';
DELETE FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'City Center';
DELETE FROM UrbanAreas WHERE sensor_id = 100 AND noise_level > 80;
DELETE FROM Sensors WHERE installation_date < '2021-06-30' AND location = 'City Center';
DELETE FROM sensor_readings WHERE noise_level > 80.00 AND date(timestamp) = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND installation_date < '2022-01-01';
